There are too many things which we notice after we lost something or someone. This movie is a story about loss demolition and regeneration One day a socially successful business man Davis Jake Gylleanhaal loses his wife in an car accident But he doesn't feel sad at all for some reason Of course he can t cry. On the c ontrary he writes a complaining letter because he is angry that the chocolate vending machine in a hospital is out of order After he writes the letter a customer service representative of the vending machine company Karen Naomi Watts calls him one night and he starts to have a relationship with her and her troublemaker son Chris. How to face sadness is different with each person The ways to face it are for example having grief and sorrow crying sharing the sorrow with someone giving oneself up to despair becoming unable to do anything But Davis way is something different from ordinary people He dismantles things which he can t get what he wants and destroy memories with his wife. He dismantles a leaking refrigerator his work computer which often occurs some errors a door which is hard to close in a bathroom and a lamp which flashes on and off one after another To the people around him he just seems going mad with sadness for losing his wife But he is trying to find out why they don t properly work as if dismantled his own heart and tried to find out why he couldn t feel sad and have loved his wife properly. The dismantling works and the strange interaction with Karen and Chris makes him notice what he hasn t noticed so far little by little and he regenerates his lost heart Eventually he demolishes the house where he and his wife spent a lot of time and he finds something in the middle of the demolition. In the end he tells his father in law there was love between me and Julia I just didn t take care of it .” I wrote first that we notice after we lost something or someone but it is better to say that we notice after we lost them and face the loss and ourselves Then how to face them is really different with each person. This movie is not normal one and difficult to expect how the story advances because Davis is not a normal person who have common sense It may sound that the movie deals with a heavy theme but there are some comical scenes in it so we can feel free to watch However there are really a lot of metaphors in its details therefore we can t understand all just by watch ing it once Anyway it is a very special movie which we can find something new every time we watch.
